選択肢
…タイトルに戻る。
背景居酒屋
And, time passes...
\n<Kino>Well then, let's start raw for now.
\n<Momo>No, two raw ones~
\n<Sawa>I'm sorry, three raw ones, please.

\n<Izakaya Clerk>Three draft beers, right? Thank you very
much! Please wait a moment!

\n<Kino>It's been a while since the three of us
drank together like this. Sawa, you seem
to be doing well, right?

\n<Momo>Now I'm Sawa-sensei, you know~. From now
on, you have to call me sensei~

\n<Sawa>D-Don't tease me... It's just lucky that I
became a picture book author like
this...

\n<Kino>Luck... but it's an important factor. We've
seen plenty of talented people who
couldn't sell.

\n<Sawa>Yes... I'm really grateful to the people
around me.

After about half a year from that incident at
the end of summer, our band disbanded
and we retired from the entertainment
industry, leaving Minato behind.

......Afterwards, I decided to pursue my dream of
becoming a picture book author. They
formed a unit and started their
activities as nyutubers.

I was also quite surprised at their
lightness of footwork back then.

\n<Momo>Speaking of gratitude, we're going to do a live
stream to celebrate reaching 500,000
subscribers. Sawa, would you like to
make an appearance too?

\n<Sawa>Absolutely not. Last time, I had a terrible
experience...

\n<Momo>Don't worry, this time we won't force you to
wear a swimsuit or anything~ It's just a
casual stream to celebrate reaching
500,000 subscribers while having a chat~

\n<Kino>Well... on a serious note, please think about
it. I've already talked to Minato about
it, but...

\n<Sawa>Even for Minato!? That's just too much... It
doesn't seem like the right time for
that now...

\n<Kino>Hmm... It didn't seem like it, but I invited
them today and it seems like they're
carelessly going on a trip?

\n<Momo>Ahaha, Minato seems to be such a free-spirited
person~
\n<Sawa>Yes... on a trip...

\n<Momo>How's Manechan been lately? It seems like
they couldn't come today either. I
wonder if they're busy?

\n<Sawa>Huh? W-Well... I don't know the details
since we only contact each other once or
twice a month... but they recently
changed jobs, so it's still early
days...

\n<Kino>Well, I guess there's no helping it...
There's also the physical distance and
it's not easy to casually participate.

\n<Momo>Let's coordinate our schedules and give
Manechan a call next time~? If they
can't come, we'll go visit them
instead... Ah... wait a minute... could
it be...
\n<Sawa>Yes, I think that's probably the case...

\n<Kino>Hmm... What's that all about? Both of you
smirking like that is kinda creepy...

\n<Sawa>Hehe, I was just thinking that it's already
spring.
\n<Momo>That's right~ *giggles*

\n<Izakaya Clerk>Three medium-sized draft beers, sorry to keep
you waiting~!

\n<Sawa>Well then, let's cheers♪ To everyone's good
health and prosperity----...
\n<Momo & Izakaya Clerk>Cheers!

\n<Kino>Hey, you! Don't leave me behind! Explain
properly, dammit!!

We parted ways and each started walking
our own paths. And... those two as well,
once again----...
A

END00
\n<\N[5]>Good morning! I'm back!

\n<Senior Staff>Good morning, what a disaster. According to
the forecast, it was supposed to start
raining at night...

\n<\N[5]>Well... we can't do anything about the weather,
so...

Both of them look out the window. The snow
that started falling sporadically since
noon has now turned into a heavy
snowfall.

\n<Senior Staff>Today was their first live, right? Oh?
Speaking of which, where are they...

\n<\N[5]>Well... after the live, they complained of not
feeling well, so I let them go home
today to take care of themselves.
\n<Senior Staff>I see... How was the attendance?
\n<\N[5]>Um... well, I guess it was so-so...
\n<Senior Staff>I see, I see...

The man stands by the window and looks up
at the cloudy sky.
\n<Senior Staff>...They might not last very long either.

\n<Senior Staff>Self-display desire... no, it would be more accurate
to say the desire for approval. In this
day and age, there are countless ways to
fulfill that, right?

I understand what you want to say... but
I can't agree. Because I have seen
someone who is truly straightforward and
unaffected by adversity, more closely
than anyone else...

\n<Senior Staff>...With this snow, we can't do business, right?
It's a bit early, but you can go home
today.

\n<\N[5]>Yes... Well then, excuse me for leaving first.
Good work today.
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪01 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on

After the events at the end of summer, I
resigned from Onomichi Productions and
handed over everything to my junior.

......I intended to establish my own 'sense of
responsibility'. I should have done it
sooner. Just because I became involved
with her doesn't mean I should become
emotional. The truth is, she didn't
really need me.

But, I am aware that it was just a facade
and in my true feelings, I ran away. My
position, my responsibilities... and
even from her----...

That man was the only thing I was worried
about... but it was needless concern.
Without using the weapon we had, that
man self-destructed.

When we escaped from the mansion, it seems
that the sirens that were ringing were a
bad idea. The sound echoed throughout
the town in the middle of the night,
causing a huge uproar in various
directions. As a result, our past
misdeeds were exposed to the public, and
now we are reluctantly confined behind
bars.
\n<\N[5]>Haah... What am I doing...
Looking up at the cold sky, I mutter to myself.

Even if I were to run away, it seems
terribly ridiculous to continue to be
involved in the job of supporting the
protagonist... But, it seems that won't
last long either.
\n<\N[5]>...Should I go home?
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪02 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on
\n<\N[5]>(It's piled up quite a bit...)

I walk about 10 minutes on foot to my
home. Unlike my previous workplace, this
short commute time is a relief.

I notice a family walking towards me as I
walk, shrinking myself from the cold.

\n<Excited child>I'm so excited... I've never been to this
town before...

\n<Worried mother>Enough... isn't it dangerous to suddenly run
towards someone you don't know...
\n<Excited child>I know my way around this town!

I pass by a parent and child. Unable to
resist, I find myself listening to the
still excited child.

\n<\N[5]>(Black Rider... Ah, was he the protagonist of
that hero series that has been
continuing since long ago?)

I had heard that name often in
commercials and such, so I was familiar
with it. I too was obsessed with that
series when I was a child, so naturally
memories from that time resurface and my
cheeks break into a smile.

\n<\N[5]>Hehe... It's nostalgic. Yeah... I should go
back to my parents' house... Huh!?

I was lost in thought and didn't notice
until they approached. That person...
stood there at the center of a world
dyed in white, with an appearance that
seemed completely out of place.

\n<\N[5]>(Is this the person that child was talking
about earlier...)
\n<A person dressed entirely in black>「.........」

I quickly pass by the person dressed
entirely in black and leave.
\n<A person dressed entirely in black>Hey, wait a moment.
\n<\N[5]>Huh...? S-Sorry! I'm in a hurry, so...
\n<A person dressed entirely in black>H-Hey! I-I'm the one... it's me...

\n<Minato>Geez... You can tell just by my voice... And
what do you mean by 'making it in time',
already...

\n<\N[5]>No, it's impossible... That person had a
blatantly dangerous aura...

\n<Minato>Even though it's been a while, you're so
rude...
\n<\N[5]>Indeed... that's right, my apologies...

\n<Minato>...I-Is work going well? It looks like you're
already heading home today...

\n<\N[5]>With this kind of weather... it's just a
coincidence today.
\n<Minato>I see... Just a coincidence, huh...

Despite trying to appear calm, they were quite
shaken on the inside. However... it
seemed that she was feeling the same
way, as an awkward atmosphere hung
between the two of them.
\n<\N[5]>You... why are you here? And... why...
\n<Minato>...Let's walk a bit...

... On New Year's Eve last year, she, who
had achieved participation in that
nationally popular music program,
suddenly announced her retirement just
one month later.

The shocking incident of the popular idol,
who was at the height of her popularity,
caused a great stir in society and
various speculations flew around. Even
now, ten days after the announcement, it
is being widely discussed on TV shows
and other media.
\n<\N[5]>...Did you come here on a motorcycle?

\n<Minato>No... I got rid of the motorcycle before
coming here. So I just used the
Shinkansen and taxis like normal...

\n<\N[5]>I see... So you got rid of that
motorcycle...

Minato's gaze falls onto the helmet she is
holding.

\n<Minato>Ah, this... I couldn't bring myself to
throw it away. Besides, maybe I can use
it to keep warm...

\n<\N[5]>Keeping warm... so that's why you're dressed
like that...

\n<Minato>W-Well, I did think I might look a little
suspicious... But it's actually quite
warm, and it completely hides my face
perfectly...

...Isn't that wrong? What I wanted to ask wasn't
about that, right?

At the height of popularity, why did she
retire? Did she grow tired of singing?
If that's the case, wasn't it me who
took away her singing?
\n<\N[5]>Neon, why...?

......I'm at a loss for words. Is it okay to ask
such a casual question? I, who ran away
from her...
\n<Minato>It's fine... I've done everything.

I lose my words as I see her... that calm
expression. In an instant, I understand
that no matter what the outsiders say,
this person won't be stopped.

\n<Minato>I... even when I was alone, I did my best,
right? \N[5]-san, were you watching?
\n<\N[5]>Ah... Of course. I was watching closely...

I don't think the decision I made was
wrong even now. Because her success is
the ultimate proof...

\n<Minato>I see... Well, that's good. I'm glad I
was able to hear that.
She runs into the empty park.
\n<Minato>\{ \N[5]-san! I was amazing, right? \}

\n<\N[5]>\{Ah, you were amazing! You shone brighter
than anyone else, \}!

In the center of the world dyed white, she
raises both hands and looks up at the
sky. My heart is shaken by this unreal
sight, and I instinctively respond.

\n<Minato>\{That's right! I was shining! I reached the top
of one summit! \}

\n<Minato>...\{, but it's still not enough! I can shine
even more! \}
She turns around and faces me.

\n<Minato>\{ Do you remember what you said when you
recruited me, \}?
\n<\N[5]>When I recruited you... ah...

I want to deliver your song to the
world... , let me... no, allow me to
help you with that!

......I remember. That awkward and embarrassing
catchphrase...

\n<Minato>\{ My song hasn't reached the world yet!
That's why \}----...
\n<Minato>I want you to help me again...
\n<\N[5]>...But...you've already done it all...

\n<Minato>Not in Japan. Next, I'm thinking of
starting over and continuing my
activities overseas.
No... don't get excited.

\n<\N[5]>W-Why are you suddenly saying something like
that...? Besides, someone like me...
\n<Minato>Please... don't run away from me anymore...
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪03 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on

He couldn't help but embrace her as she
showed such a weak and fragile figure,
as if she would disappear into the snow
that was falling heavily.
\n<Minato>Huh... \N[5]-san...?

\n<\N[5]>You're right... I was trying to run away
again...

\n<\N[5]>I selfishly assumed that I was not a
suitable man for you... and convinced
myself that distancing myself from you
would be for your own good.

Hidden feelings that have been kept secret are
overflowing.

\n<\N[5]>I'm truly a pathetic man... I'm not the
kind of man you think I am.

\n<\N[5]>But... even so, I want to be by your side. I
will show you that I can stand proudly
by your side, so this time... please
look at me.
\n<Minato>\N[5]...san...

\n<\N[5]>...That's why, let me say it again. Let me help
you deliver your song to the world.
\n<Minato>Ugh... Ugh... Ngh... Ahh...

\n<Minato>I'm glad... huff... I was worried about
what I would do if you had rejected
me...

......The person in my arms was crying like a
child. I once again keenly felt my own
foolishness.

I don't go as far as deifying her, but I
think I saw her in that light. Even she
has worries, gets hurt... and gets lost.
She's just a human being after all.

But finally... I feel like I've taken the
first step... It was a simple thing. All
I had to do was to stand by your side at
the same eye level.

\n<\N[5]>I'm sorry... Minato, I'm sorry... From now
on, we'll always be together...
\n<Minato>Ugh... Ugh... Ahhh...

The snow that piles up... turns the scenery
reflected in my eyes white.

Due to the fact that there was no one
around, I was trapped in the illusion
that this entire area had been cut off
from the world.

... But the warmth in my arms is not an
illusion. I hold  tightly, making sure
not to let go anymore.

Minato: Ugh... We can start again, huh? Thank
you, ... *sniff*... Really, thank you...
\N[5]: ...\N[5]-san? Did you say something just now?

Minato: No... It's nothing. Well then, let's
go, Neon----...

Ah, I won't let you escape anymore! , I'm
watching too, so... please watch me from
the closest spot to me.

In this way... within a world dyed in
white, we leaned on each other  and
started walking side by side------....
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪02 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on
B

\n<Personality Rajitan>Good evening! It's time for 'evening breeze'
again this week! I'm your host, Rajitan!

\n<Personality Rajitan>Guess what? The first snowfall has been
observed in the Kanto region! It's so
exciting, isn't it? My dog is also super
excited and full of energy! Oh, by the
way, I started raising him last week!

\n<Personality Rajitan>I'm still thinking about a name... Ah! I
got it! It might be interesting to do a
name suggestion here!... But, I see a
gesture telling me not to talk about
unnecessary things, so let's save this
topic for another time!

\n<Personality Rajitan>Ahem... Well then, without further ado, let's
kick off this week's opening song!

\n<Personality Rajitan>I'm sure many of you were surprised by the
sudden retirement announcement, right?
I'm also one of those people and I'm
truly just sad...

\n<Personality Rajitan>But... even now, somewhere, she must be
singing! I can't help but hope for that.
Well then... let me introduce her.

\n<Personality Rajitan>From her band days until today, I was
surprised that there was something she
hadn't sung before.

\n<Personality Rajitan>This number became my first love song and
also my last song. Sung by Minato
Neon---...
